General.Name: Indo Tech Transformers Limited
General.Description: Indo Tech Transformers Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of transformers in India and internationally. It offers distribution, power, large power, skid mounted, and ester oil transformers, as well as various special application and mobile sub-station transformers; and sub-stations. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Kancheepuram, India. Indo Tech Transformers Limited is a subsidiary of Prolec GE, S. de R.L. de C.V.
